scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run unit
scripts.local:dev: npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --parameter-overrides StageName=Dev --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.local:prod: npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --parameter-overrides StageName=Prod --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
